name: 24th World Nutrition and Pediatrics Healthcare Conference
content: Nutrition & Pediatrics 2020 welcomes all the nutrionists, dieticians, healthcare professionals, worldwide Specialists, Researchers, Analysts, Understudies, Nurses, Exhibitors, Investigators, Pediatricians, Pharmacists, Primary Care Professional, Professors and Industrial Pharmaceuticals and Business delegates to our “24th World Nutrition & Pediatrics Healthcare Conference” which is scheduled during April 29-30, 2020 in Dubai, UAE. It includes prompt Keynote Forum, Oral Presentation ( Speaker Forum, Young Research forum), Poster Presentation, Exhibitions and Workshops. It includes a detailed understanding of Clinical Pediatrics, Food Science and Nutrition, Neonatology & perinatology, Pediatrics healthcare and Nutrition, Child Psychology and Mental Health, Family care, Malnutrition and many more.
